snippet: OPPENHEIMER--Inge. We deeply mourn the passing of our dear friend, Inge. We had a close and devoted friendship for almost six decades as we raised our families and enjoyed each other's children and grandchildren. We will miss her greatly. Susi Leiter and Barbara Marks 1/3
lead_paragraph: OPPENHEIMER--Inge. We deeply mourn the passing of our dear friend, Inge. We had a close and devoted friendship for almost six decades as we raised our families and enjoyed each other's children and grandchildren. We will miss her greatly. Susi Leiter and Barbara Marks 1/3
